lore: Striding through a mist of their own sacred incense, the long-limbed engines ridden by Sydonian Dragoons are forever in motion. Dragoons mark their quarry with shots of glowing phosphor or irradiated slugs, allowing them to detect their prey through the cloying mist and home in on them with a thunderous stampede.

otherAbilities.Elevated Strider:: This unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back , and you can re-roll Desperate Escape tests taken for models in this unit.
otherAbilities.Broad Spectrum Data-tether:: Each time you select this unit as the target of a Stratagem , roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.
